original_text: For who is there of all flesh, that hath heard the voice of the living God speaking out of the midst of the fire, as we have, and lived?
korean_text: 육신을 가진 자로서 우리처럼 살아 계시는 하나님의 음성이 불 가운데에서 발함을 듣고 생존한 자가 누구니이까

sentences.original_text: For who is there of all flesh
that hath heard the voice of the living God
speaking out of the midst of the fire
